channel.title: kde connect on Antonio Martinović Blog
channel.description: Recent content in kde connect on Antonio Martinović Blog

item.title: KDE Connect commands
item.description: KDE Connect useful commands So I’ve been using KDE Connect Android application for a while now due to it’s great intergration KDE Plasma desktop. It allows you send files over, share your clipboard, sync notifications and has other usefull features like remote control using the phones screen as a touchpad or keyboard on your computer which is greatly apreciated feature for when you just couln’t be asked to reach for your mouse to select the next YouTube video to play.
